Two actors play the young and middle aged Charlotte and she plays herself in the later years.","popularity":1.73,"poster_path":"/uSLkUYwTRbqu2oaLPuAfQwNsKm3.jpg","release_date":"1992-10-30","title":"I Am My Own Woman","video":false,"vote_average":4.3,"vote_count":6},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/xPeGMnJUk6wHmabrdh24OL7zKBs.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":705962,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Where On Earth Can We Go?","overview":"You've seen them in pictures...Now see them on the big screen! Everyone's favorite best friends make their feature length debut in a slice of life experience fit for the whole family to enjoy. Follow Abuse of Power as they make their way across the world and back while getting into a little trouble along the way! Will they die in a horrible car wreck? Will Yoon be detained for international war crimes? Will Kaleb and Lon drown Lucky in a hot spring? Will J Little laugh at everything? Did Jug capture all of this action? There is only one way to find out...","popularity":2.764,"poster_path":"/s3OR1T2F7TNbiokTzRLwgRvCJxl.jpg","release_date":"2019-02-08","title":"Where On Earth Can We Go?","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":1185944,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Einmal Hooligan - immer Hooligan?","overview":"The documentary accompanies a group of soccer fans twice on a train ride to a soccer match - first in 1991 and then again in 2006. Have the fans learned something or are they still hooligans?","popularity":1.25,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2006-01-01","title":"Einmal Hooligan - immer Hooligan?","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":9553,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Lenin kam nur bis Lüdenscheid - Meine kleine deutsche Revolution","overview":"","popularity":0.892,"poster_path":"/jZkPnclrLuAnE8PZQTkKPC4oF74.jpg","release_date":"2008-02-11","title":"Lenin kam nur bis Lüdenscheid - Meine kleine deutsche Revolution","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":876191,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Spiritual Letters","overview":"The film is a story about the deep connection of the life and art of the artist. It takes you on a journey through Berlin like you have never seen before. Take a deep dive behind the scenes of the famous red and blue graffiti letterings that cover the heart of  the city and tune into the connection between art, letters and spirituality.","popularity":0.934,"poster_path":"/xeuRPgX81CWsfyQTcmYPSZq4ZlS.jpg","release_date":"2021-09-27","title":"Spiritual Letters","video":false,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/nzWyyoIgpFZxEhPiisfHSz2pAzI.jpg","genre_ids":[99,10752],"id":701604,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Berlin 1945 - Tagebuch einer Großstadt","overview":"Berlin 1945 time-travels into the city’s most fateful year through the eyes of those, who experienced it: German people and Allied soldiers. A fast paced collage creates an in-the-moment narrative of how the war was won and lost. Hitlerboy Dirk and Goebbels watch their world implode, while Alice fears for her children in Auschwitz and Russian soldier Victor walks through the plundered Chancellery. When it’s all over, Germans learn democracy and socialism. Giving voice to Soviet, US, UK and French soldiers as well as to the German population anxiously awaiting the outcome of the fighting. BERLIN 1945 creates an innovative, comprehensive narrative of how the war was won and lost, how the city was liberated and how it emerged from the rubble.","popularity":2.75,"poster_path":"/q5lULXB10V8fRGigYGJ6iZRJDHx.jpg","release_date":"2020-05-05","title":"Berlin 1945 - Diary of a Metropolis","video":false,"vote_average":6.8,"vote_count":11},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":3517,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Tunten lügen nicht","overview":"Bosom buddies BeV StroganoV, Ovo Maltine, Ichgola Androgyn and Tima die Göttliche are four Berlin drag queens who met in the mid 1980s. These four queens became Germany’s most popular drag performers and have been busy fertilizing the German cultural scene. Besides being performers, they are also political activists – in AIDS awareness, anti-gay violence, the sex workers movement and the struggle against the extreme right and racism. The film tells their story.","popularity":2.143,"poster_path":"/93dQfwLIEFlMOFFYUzO2RVwBHxD.jpg","release_date":"2002-02-09","title":"Queens Don’t Cry","video":false,"vote_average":4.0,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":252729,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Julia","overview":"Julia is a young transgender woman who left her home country of Lithuania. Now living in Germany, she walks the streets of Berlin, working as a prostitute to survive. This documentary revisits Julia over a ten-year period of her life.","popularity":1.683,"poster_path":"/yYJVsq6W2pHBSf3cDAitrfRkSmv.jpg","release_date":"2013-08-31","title":"Julia","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":406076,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Berlinized","overview":"The documentary BERLINIZED describes this very Berlin-specific attitude in a reflection on and a journey to mid-1990s' Berlin. Filmmaker Lucian Busse, an active protagonist of the period, documents the transformation of Berlin after the Wall. But Berlinized represents more than just the 1990s - it is a metaphor for this virally catching creative feeling, the slightly rough directness, spiced up with a big dash of typical Berlin humor. Berlinized lets the former protagonists reflect how that temporary feeling of freedom shaped their individual lives, and to what degree that freedom can still be found among the neat order of today's Berlin. These reflections are as diverse as the interviewees and as multifaceted as the changes in those times.","popularity":0.437,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2012-04-21","title":"Berlinized","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":869197,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Merkel-Jahre - Am Ende einer Ära","overview":"The film shines a light onto federal chancellor Angela Merkel and her now ending 16-year-long tenure. An era, not an episode. And a vagarious relationship history between the chancellor and the Germans.
